creditline: Gift of Leo A. and Doris Hodroff
description: four-case inrō; fundame decorated in togidashi, hiramaki-e, hirame and takamaki-e with a traveler dozing on low bed, fan with Mica before face, on gold ground; reverse visions of glory 'Dream Cloud'; Saku and Kao with agate bead ojime; ivory netsuke of Ono No Tofu and frog; attached with brown, braided, silk cord through inro and ties at bottom
medium: Lacquer (togidashi, hiramaki-e, hirame, takamaki-e); ojime: stone; netsuke: ivory; silk cord
signed: inrō bottom: 春義作 and kao {Haruoyoshi and kao}; \'Tomotane\', on netsuke
title: Four-case inro with decor of traveler dozing
